QuestData.Title: Gluttonous Lurkers
QuestData.Description: My master, Finklestein, is in the shrine at Heb'Valok to the northwest preparing a truth serum, and he needs basilisk crystals. Heb'Valok is on the west side of the road leading north before the Altar of Sseratus.$B$BThere are basilisks to the east at Drak'Agal.$B$BIf you grab the Zul'Drak rats and throw them at the basilisk, they will become gorged and docile after eating five. Then you'll be able to take their crystals.$B$BKilling the basilisk won't do you any good. That'd just break its crystals!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver 5 Basilisk Crystals to Alchemist Finklestein in the shrine at Heb'Valok.
QuestData.CompletionText: What's all this?$B$BBy any chance have you seen my no-good apprentice, Pestlepot?$B$BI sent him on an errand quite some time ago and he has yet to return!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, most excellent! Thank you. The crystals appear to be in fine condition!$B$BI have no doubt that Pestlepot put you up to doing his chores for him. Nevertheless, your assistance in this matter is greatly appreciated!
